jwiki.core

Class Wiki

  • java.lang.Object
    • jwiki.core.Wiki

  • public class Wiki
extends Object
    Main class of libjwiki. Most developers will only need this class. This class implements all queries/actions which libjwiki can perform on a wiki. All methods are backed by static calls and are thread-safe.
    Author:
    Fastily

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Wiki(String user, String px)
      Constructor, auto initializes first domain to Wikimedia Commons.
      Wiki(String user, String px, String domain)
      Constructor, takes user, password, and domain to login as.

      • Wiki

        public Wiki(String user,
            String px)
     throws LoginException
        Constructor, auto initializes first domain to Wikimedia Commons.
        Parameters:
        user - The username to use
        px - The password to use
        Throws:
        LoginException - If we failed to login

      • Wiki

        public Wiki(String user,
            String px,
            String domain)
     throws LoginException
        Constructor, takes user, password, and domain to login as.
        Parameters:
        user - The username to use
        px - The password to use
        domain - The domain name, in shorthand form (e.g. en.wikipedia.org)
        Throws:
        LoginException - If we failed to login

    • Method Detail

      • getWiki

        public Wiki getWiki(String domain)
        Gets a Wiki object for this domain. This method is cached, to save bandwidth. We will create a new wiki as necessary. PRECONDITION: The CentralAuth extension MUST be installed on your MediaWiki cluster for this to work.
        Parameters:
        domain - The domain to use
        Returns:
        The wiki, or null if something went wrong.

      • whoami

        public String whoami()
        Gets the user we're logged in as.
        Returns:
        The user we're logged in as.

      • getNS

        public NS getNS(String prefix)
        Takes a Namespace prefix and gets a NS representation of it. PRECONDITION: the prefix must be a valid namespace prefix. WARNING: This method is CASE-SENSITIVE, so be sure to spell and capitalize the prefix exactly as it would appear on-wiki.
        Parameters:
        prefix - The prefix to use, without the ":".
        Returns:
        An NS representation of the prefix.

      • whichNS

        public NS whichNS(String title)
        Gets the namespace, in NS form, of a title. No namespace or an invalid namespace is assumed to be part of Main.
        Parameters:
        title - The title to get an NS for.
        Returns:
        The title's NS.

      • nss

        public String nss(String title)
        Strip the namespace from a title.
        Parameters:
        title - The title to strip the namespace from
        Returns:
        The title without a namespace

      • filterByNS

        public ArrayList<String> filterByNS(ArrayList<String> pages,
                                    NS... ns)
        Filters pages by namespace. Only pages with a namespace in ns are selected.
        Parameters:
        pages - Titles to filter
        ns - Pages in this/these namespace(s) will be returned.
        Returns:
        Titles belonging to a NS in ns

      • convertIfNotInNS

        public String convertIfNotInNS(String title,
                               NS ns)
        Check if a title in specified namespace and convert it if it is not.
        Parameters:
        title - The title to check
        ns - The namespace to convert the title to.
        Returns:
        The same title if it is in ns, or the converted title.

      • isVerifiedFor

        public boolean isVerifiedFor(String domain)
        Checks if we're verified for the specified domain.
        Parameters:
        domain - Do we have login credentials for this domain?
        Returns:
        True if we're verified for the specified domain.

      • submit

        public <T extends MBot.Task> ArrayList<MBot.Task> submit(ArrayList<T> tasks,
                                                         int maxThreads)
        Submit a task to be processed using concurrency.
        Type Parameters:
        T - An object implementing doJob() in MBot.Task
        Parameters:
        tasks - The tasks to process
        maxThreads - The maximum number of threads to instantiate.
        Returns:
        A list of tasks we couldn't execute.

      • edit

        public boolean edit(String title,
                    String text,
                    String reason)
        Edit a page, and check if the request actually went through.
        Parameters:
        title - The title to use
        text - The text to use
        reason - The edit summary to use
        Returns:
        True if the operation was successful.

      • addText

        public boolean addText(String title,
                       String add,
                       String reason,
                       boolean top)
        Appends text to a page. If title does not exist, then create the page normally with text
        Parameters:
        title - The title to edit.
        add - The text to append
        reason - The reason to use.
        top - Set to true to prepend text. False will append text.
        Returns:
        True if we were successful.

      • replaceText

        public boolean replaceText(String title,
                           String regex,
                           String reason)
        Removes text from a page. Does nothing if the replacement requested wouldn't change any text on wiki (method still returns true however).
        Parameters:
        title - The title to perform the replacement at.
        regex - A regex matching the text to remove.
        reason - The edit summary.
        Returns:
        True if we were successful.

      • replaceText

        public boolean replaceText(String title,
                           String regex,
                           String replacement,
                           String reason)
        Replaces text on a page. Does nothing if the replacement requested wouldn't change any text on wiki (method still returns true however).
        Parameters:
        title - The title to perform replacement on.
        regex - The regex matching the text to replace.
        replacement - The replacing text.
        reason - The edit summary.
        Returns:
        True if were were successful.

      • undo

        public boolean undo(String title,
                    String reason)
        Undo the top revision of a page. PRECONDITION: title must point to a valid page.
        Parameters:
        title - The title to edit
        reason - The reason to use
        Returns:
        True if we were successful.

      • nullEdit

        public boolean nullEdit(String title)
        Null edits a page.
        Parameters:
        title - The title to null edit
        Returns:
        True if we were successful.

      • purge

        public boolean purge(String title)
        Purge a page.
        Parameters:
        title - The title to purge
        Returns:
        True if we were successful.

      • delete

        public boolean delete(String title,
                      String reason)
        Deletes a page. You must have admin rights or this won't work.
        Parameters:
        title - Title to delete
        reason - The reason to use
        Returns:
        True if the operation was successful.

      • undelete

        public boolean undelete(String title,
                        String reason)
        Undelete a page. You must have admin rights on the wiki you are trying to perform this task on, otherwise it won't go through.
        Parameters:
        title - The title to undelete
        reason - The reason to use
        Returns:
        True if we successfully undeleted the page.

      • upload

        public boolean upload(Path p,
                      String title,
                      String text,
                      String reason)
        Upload a media file.
        Parameters:
        p - The file to use
        title - The title to upload to. Must include "File:" prefix.
        text - The text to put on the file description page
        reason - The edit summary
        Returns:
        True if we were successful.

      • listGroupsRights

        public ArrayList<String> listGroupsRights(String user)
        Gets the list of usergroups (rights) a user belongs to. Sample groups: sysop, user, autoconfirmed, editor.
        Parameters:
        user - The user to get rights information for. Do not include "User:" prefix.
        Returns:
        The usergroups user belongs to.

      • getPageText

        public String getPageText(String title)
        Gets the text of a page.
        Parameters:
        title - The title to query
        Returns:
        The text of the page, or an empty string if the page is non-existent/something went wrong.

      • getRevisions

        public ArrayList<Revision> getRevisions(String title,
                                        int cap,
                                        boolean olderFirst)
        Gets the revisions of a page.
        Parameters:
        title - The title to query
        cap - The maximum number of results to return. Optional param: set to any number zero or less to disable.
        olderFirst - Set to true to enumerate from older → newer revisions
        Returns:
        A list of page revisions

      • getRevisions

        public ArrayList<Revision> getRevisions(String title)
        Gets all the revisions of a page. Caveat: Pages such as the admin's notice board have ~106 revisions. Watch your memory usage. Revisions are returned in order of newer → older revisions
        Parameters:
        title - The title to query.
        Returns:
        A list of page revisions

      • getCategorySize

        public int getCategorySize(String title)
        Gets the number of elements contained in a category.
        Parameters:
        title - The title to query. PRECONDITION: Title *must* begin with the "Category:" prefix
        Returns:
        The number of elements in the category. Value returned will be -1 if Category entered was empty and non-existent.

      • getCategoryMembers

        public ArrayList<String> getCategoryMembers(String title,
                                            NS... ns)
        Get all titles in a category.
        Parameters:
        title - The category to query, including the "Category:" prefix.
        ns - Namespace filter. Any title not in the specified namespace(s) will be ignored. Leave blank to select all namespaces.
        Returns:
        The list of titles in the category.

      • getCategoryMembers

        public ArrayList<String> getCategoryMembers(String title,
                                            int cap,
                                            NS... ns)
        Get a limited number of titles in a category. This could be seen as an optimizing routine - the method does not fetch any more items than requested from the server.
        Parameters:
        title - The category to query, including the "Category:" prefix.
        cap - The maximum number of elements to return. Optional param - set to 0 to disable.
        ns - Namespace filter. Any title not in the specified namespace(s) will be ignored. Leave blank to select all namespaces.
        Returns:
        The list of titles, as specified, in the category.

      • getCategoriesOnPage

        public ArrayList<String> getCategoriesOnPage(String title)
        Gets the categories a page is categorized in.
        Parameters:
        title - The title to get categories of.
        Returns:
        A list of categories, or the empty list if something went wrong.

      • getLinksOnPage

        public ArrayList<String> getLinksOnPage(String title,
                                        NS... ns)
        Gets wiki links on a page.
        Parameters:
        title - The title to query
        ns - Namespaces to include-only. Optional, leave blank to select all namespaces.
        Returns:
        The list of wiki links on the page.

      • getLinksOnPage

        public ArrayList<String> getLinksOnPage(boolean exists,
                                        String title,
                                        NS... ns)
        Gets all existing or non-existing wiki links on a page.
        Parameters:
        exists - Fetch mode. Set true to get existing pages and false to get missing/non-existent pages.
        title - The title to query
        ns - Namespaces to include-only. Optional, leave blank to select all namespaces.
        Returns:
        The list of existing links on title

      • getContribs

        public ArrayList<Contrib> getContribs(String user,
                                      int cap,
                                      boolean olderFirst,
                                      NS... ns)
        Gets the contributions of a user.
        Parameters:
        user - The user to get contribs for, without the "User:" prefix.
        cap - The maximum number of results to return.
        olderFirst - Set to true to enumerate from older → newer revisions
        ns - Restrict titles returned to the specified Namespace(s). Optional, leave blank to select all namespaces.
        Returns:
        A list of contributions.

      • getContribs

        public ArrayList<Contrib> getContribs(String user,
                                      NS... ns)
        Gets all contributions of a user. Revisions are returned in order of newer → older revisions. Some users have well over a million contributions. Watch your memory usage!
        Parameters:
        user - The user to get contribs for, without the "User:" prefix.
        ns - Restrict titles returned to the specified Namespace(s). Optional, leave blank to select all namespaces.
        Returns:
        A list of contributions.

      • getUserUploads

        public ArrayList<String> getUserUploads(String user)
        Get a user's uploads.
        Parameters:
        user - The username, without the "User:" prefix. PRECONDITION: user must be a valid username.
        Returns:
        This user's uploads

      • fileUsage

        public ArrayList<String> fileUsage(String title)
        Gets a list of pages linking to a file.
        Parameters:
        title - The title to query. PRECONDITION: This must be a valid file name prefixed with the "File:" prefix, or you will get strange results.
        Returns:
        A list of pages linking to the file.

      • getImagesOnPage

        public ArrayList<String> getImagesOnPage(String title)
        Gets titles of images linked on a page.
        Parameters:
        title - The title to query
        Returns:
        The images found on title

      • exists

        public boolean exists(String title)
        Checks if a title exists.
        Parameters:
        title - The title to query.
        Returns:
        True if the title exists.

      • getImageInfo

        public ImageInfo getImageInfo(String title)
        Get some information about a file on Wiki. Does not fill the thumbnail param of ImageInfo.
        Parameters:
        title - The title of the file to use (must be in the file namespace and exist, else return Null)
        Returns:
        An ImageInfo object, or null if something went wrong.

      • getImageInfo

        public ImageInfo getImageInfo(String title,
                              int height,
                              int width)
        Get some information about a file on Wiki.
        Parameters:
        title - The title of the file to use (must be in the file namespace and exist, else return Null)
        height - The height to scale the image to. Disable scalers by passing in a number ≥ 0.
        width - The width to scale the image to. Disable scalers by passing in a number ≥ 0.
        Returns:
        An ImageInfo object, or null if something went wrong.

      • getTemplatesOnPage

        public ArrayList<String> getTemplatesOnPage(String title)
        Gets templates transcluded on a page.
        Parameters:
        title - The title to query.
        Returns:
        The templates transcluded on title

      • whatTranscludesHere

        public ArrayList<String> whatTranscludesHere(String title)
        Gets a list of pages transcluding a template.
        Parameters:
        title - The title to query. You *must* include the namespace prefix (e.g. "Template:") or you will get strange results.
        Returns:
        The pages transcluding title.

      • globalUsage

        public ArrayList<Tuple<String,String>> globalUsage(String title)
        Gets the global usage of a file.
        Parameters:
        title - The title to query. Must start with "File:" prefix.
        Returns:
        A list of tuples, (title of page, short form of wiki this page is from), denoting the global usage of this file. Returns empty list if something went wrong.

      • whatLinksHere

        public ArrayList<String> whatLinksHere(String title,
                                       boolean redirects)
        Gets a list of links or redirects to a page.
        Parameters:
        title - The title to query
        redirects - Set to true to get redirects only. Set to false to filter out all redirects.
        Returns:
        A list of links or redirects to this page.

      • whatLinksHere

        public ArrayList<String> whatLinksHere(String title)
        Gets a list of direct links to a page. CAVEAT: This does not get any pages linking to a redirect pointing to this page; in order to do this you will first need to obtain a list of redirects to the target, and then call whatLinksHere() on each of those redirects.
        Parameters:
        title - The title to query
        Returns:
        A list of links to this page.

      • allPages

        public ArrayList<String> allPages(String prefix,
                                  boolean redirectsonly,
                                  int cap,
                                  NS ns)
        Get a list of all pages from the Wiki.
        Parameters:
        prefix - Get files starting with this String. DO NOT include a namespace prefix (e.g. "File:"). Param is optional, use null or empty string to disable.
        redirectsonly - Set this to true to get redirects only.
        cap - The max number of titles to return. Specify -1 to get all pages.
        ns - The namespace to filter by. Set null to disable
        Returns:
        A list of titles on this Wiki

      • prefixIndex

        public ArrayList<String> prefixIndex(NS namespace,
                                     String prefix)
        Does the same thing as Special:PrefixIndex.
        Parameters:
        namespace - The namespace to filter by (inclusive)
        prefix - Get all titles in the specified namespace, that start with this String.
        Returns:
        The list of titles starting with the specified prefix

      • getDuplicatesOf

        public ArrayList<String> getDuplicatesOf(String title,
                                         boolean localOnly)
        Gets duplicates of a file. Note that results are returned *without* a namespace prefix.
        Parameters:
        title - The title to query. PRECONDITION: You MUST include the namespace prefix (e.g. "File:")
        localOnly - Set to true to restrict results to local duplicates only.
        Returns:
        Duplicates of this file.

      • listDuplicateFiles

        public ArrayList<String> listDuplicateFiles(int cap)
        Gets a list of duplicated files on the Wiki.
        Parameters:
        cap - The maximum number of titles to return
        Returns:
        Duplicated files on the Wiki.
